svg.text: Route blinded key via Onion Network
Route ciphertext to Bob's mailbox via Onion Network (E2EE the mailbox ID)
6. Add timestamp to mitigate replay attacks
Route sealed message to Bob's mailbox via Onion Network
Send sealed message to Bob's mailbox
Route blinded key via Onion Network
Delete all previous keys, nounces, MACs...
Delete all previous keys, nounces, MACs...
Introduce randomized delays before mailbox access / creation
Every mailbox ID is seen as "valid"
